pages.text: $(item)Iridium$() is the strongest material known to us. As such, this gives the best protection to ships with $(l:5_combat/hull)Superior hull$().$(br2)Last but not least, its crystaline structure has excellent vibration characteristics required for $(l:3_advanced_machines/radar)Radar$() and $(l:3_advanced_machines/cloaking)Cloaking$() systems.
Iridium blocks can be found in large asteroids from the void.$(br2)Advanced technology can also be used to produce it.
